name: Draw It - Draw One Part
description:
Time to test your drawing skills and test your brain
Play now and prove you're smarter than all the rest!

Playing is easy! Just touch the screen and drag your finger to draw part of the drawing and see what is next to it.

Like a magic pen, you will draw to unravel the hidden mysteries of this thinking game. You will have to become a shrewd sleuth and investigate the pictures carefully to locate clues. But you can never be sure that you will find any surprises later!

Make the most of your free time by playing an engaging brain game that will sharpen your wit. With Draw it: Draw One Part Game, you can chill out and get smarter at the same time! Level up your brain while you level up in the game!

Different riddles testing will challenge your mind. This new puzzle game may break common sense and test your brain with outside-the-box solutions. You can enjoy yourself with your friends with this addictive and funny free IQ game. Get ready to take the quiz! Are you ready for a brainwash with funny riddles?

Features of Draw it: Draw One PartGame:

- Jump right into the simple and straightforward gameplay of this thinking game: just swipe your finger across your phone screen to draw parts of the drawing and reveal what's next. The mechanics may be easy, but the puzzles will keep your brain guessing!

- Investigate hundreds of entertaining levels chock-full of tricky brain teasers. No two puzzles are the same! Each level stimulates your brain to approach a problem in a new way.

- Discover amazing surprises hidden after more drawings! Each stroke of your draw will uncover a new, deeper layer to the story depicted in the drawing. Only you can make the invisible visible!

- Enjoy the delightful graphics with their unique cartoon style and cute animations.
